title: API Gateway to Lambda to DynamoDB
description: Create a Lambda function that receives a request from API Gateway and inserts a record into a DynamoDB table.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern explains how to deploy a CDK application with Amazon API Gateway, AWS Lambda, and Amazon DynamoDB using the Go programming language.
See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.

author.headline: Presented by Abhishek Gupta, Principal Developer Advocate at AWS
author.name: Abhishek Gupta
